name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: vToad New Tab Page - Custom Live Wallpaper Engine, and more!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload your own live wallpapers for your vToad New Tab Page, the experience is yours!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
NOW IN BETA // NEW LOGO, UI, AND FEATURES // NEWEST CHANGELOG BELOW
//////////////////////


vToad provides you with the simple functionality to use your own uploaded videos as your new tab background! As well as a customizable search bar to set your search engine, quick access to your top visited sites, and more!

I am a solo dev and have spent a lot of time making this something that is a pleasure to use and meets all the expectations of my users and reviews I have gotten. Please enjoy! Leaving feedback, a review, or supporting me on social media and through donations would mean the world! Thank you! <3

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
NEW Features just added to vToad! (0.0.0.3 - 10/15/2024)
|| New logo! (art done by @elizavtuber)
|| Large UI overhaul
|| Manual color theme or new auto theme to match colors with current background video
|| Search engine search bar with commands (multiple search engines supported)
|| Blacklist/remove sites in your shortcuts
|| Rearrange sites how you want now
|| Manually add custom sites using the search bar (example: "/addsite google.com")
|| Toggle/Hide all the UI elements to your preferences. Enjoy your videos with no distractions!
|| Custom date and time settings - 12hr/24hr

ALL FEATURES:
|| Upload your own local videos as your New Tab live wallpaper [Supported Formats: .mp4, .webm, .ogg, .mov]
|| Automatically plays a random uploaded video as your New Tab live wallpaper every time you open a New Tab
|| Easily identify and manage your uploaded videos
|| Full visual customization with opacity, and hiding unwanted elements
|| Customizable search engine bar with commands to set your search engine
|| Access and display the websites you visit most often, removing sites you don't want.
|| Add manual sites to a new custom shortcut grid using the search bar
|| Display the local time in 12hr/24hr with or without the date
|| Sleek, lightweight, and fast functionality. Designed to provide a visual live wallpaper experience without slowing you down or getting in your way.
//////////////////////

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
PLEASE NOTE THE FOLLOWING:
|| Due to limitations, any videos you add are duplicated and stored in your browsers local storage on your computer, this can add up quickly if you add a lot of videos, or videos with very large file sizes.
|| Brave browser users must manually enable the "brave://flags/#file-system-access-api" flag and restart their browser to enable access to add videos! 
//////////////////////
